education_text.0: Rulifson joined the      Augmentation Research Center Augmentation Research Center, at the Stanford Research Institute (now      SRI International SRI International) in 1966, working on a form of software called Jeff Rulifsons papers and research from 1956 to 1997 are held at the Computer History Museum, with a guide to his work entitled Guide to the Jeff Rulifson papers, written by Bo Doub, Kim Hayden, and Sara Chabino Lott
